Todayâ€™s price action is showing a very steady structure, and in the middle of this calm movement we can clearly see how  $PAXG is holding a tight consolidation just above the 4,210 zone. This range has acted as a short-term support multiple times, and every dip toward it is getting absorbed quickly, which signals buyers quietly defending the level. If momentum picks up from here, a push toward the recent intraday highs could unfold, but a break below the support area may invite a deeper pullback.
